attributes.action: Halt immigration in this grossly over-populated country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The majority of indegenous British citizens are suffering and under serious threat because of our governments relaxed views on immigration. 

The only answer to this problem is if The elected PM halts this immediately by taking the same approach as every other european country does and protects his own people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
